level.text: The hearing examiner in a proceeding shall not communicate directly or indirectly regarding any fact or issue of law with any party or party’s representative, except on notice and with an opportunity for each party or party’s representative to participate.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 38 DCR 2034 (April 5, 1991); as amended by 54 DCR 6020 (June 22, 2007).
